# ----------------------------
# ðŸ¦‹ Flutter Project Linguist Fix
# ----------------------------
# Tells GitHub Linguist to ignore platform and build folders
# so Dart shows as the main language.
# ----------------------------

# Ignore native platform folders
android/** linguist-vendored
ios/** linguist-vendored
macos/** linguist-vendored
linux/** linguist-vendored
windows/** linguist-vendored

# Ignore build outputs
build/** linguist-vendored

# Ignore web boilerplate
web/** linguist-vendored

# Keep Dart visible
lib/** linguist-detectable=true

# Ignore test or generated files
test/** linguist-vendored
*.g.dart linguist-vendored

# Ignore lock files
pubspec.lock linguist-vendored
